attributes.action: To issue late fines on rail companies with continuously delayed services.
attributes.additional_details: For the last six weeks I have been catching northern rail trains to university, everyday without exaggerationmy train has been late meaning I miss my connection on somedays and others it gets cancelled all together,Northern rail turned around after calling more than 5 times and said that 'there is nothing we can do' by issuing fines on late trains this should encourage all rail companies to ensure that their trains are punctual, providing us the public with the rail service we need and deserve.
attributes.background:
Hi,
This is a pettition to hold rail companies to account for constant failings, as there are limited companies to travel with on our railways they think we have no other option but to put up with poor service .however if we can be backed up by pecuniary measures they will get their act together.
